amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to abortion funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3792 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 336.

action.text: Amendment SA 3792 proposed by Senator Lankford. (consideration: CR S6222-6223; text: CR S6222) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to abortion funding.
